DataModel

Class MemberList

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataModel.MemberList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject

    public class MemberList
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject
    This class represents a MemberList ( a list of all the members).
